name: iron-fist

effect.diamond_pearl: Moves flagged as being punch-based have 1.2× their base power for this Pokémon. sucker punch is not flagged as punch-based; its original, Japanese name only means "surprise attack".
effect.platinum: Moves flagged as being punch-based have 1.2× their base power for this Pokémon. sucker punch is not flagged as punch-based; its original, Japanese name only means "surprise attack".
effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Moves flagged as being punch-based have 1.2× their base power for this Pokémon. sucker punch is not flagged as punch-based; its original, Japanese name only means "surprise attack".

short_effect: Strengthens punch-based moves to 1.2× their power.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: Boosts the power of punching moves.
flavor_text.platinum: Boosts the power of punching moves.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: Boosts the power of punching moves.
